mods.abstract: Page 107 of the album includes three photographs.; Photograph 1 [60] shows a caravan of cattle drawn wagons moving down a dirt road. Buildings, probable town, and trees shown in the background.; Photograph 2 [61] shows burned trees in a forest, three men in suits survey the situation. Probable controlled burn.; Photograph 3 [62] shows a caravan of cattle drawn wagons moving down a dirt road. Buildings, probable town, and trees shown in the background.
